channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Convenience In Collections Matter
item.description: As digital transformation accelerates, companies prioritizing convenience, automation and integration will thrive.

item.description: Artificial Intelligence for Business, Kamales Lardi, is another good introductory book to the subject.
